name: Hakuoki - Okita Souji (tumblr dashboard)
description:
A Hakuoki dashboard theme for tumblr.
Made originally for myself, so a few mistakes here and there.
First time coding lol.
Also, trust me, it actually is more neat than the preview.

user.name: Kou
user.about: I'm not really a pro coder so my designs are always simple, but clean, I guess. I always try to use official art and I think coding is hell.

additional_info: LOTS OF CREDIT TO OCHI-SENSEI AND MANDY FOR THE HEADER (LOGO AND ICONS) Made of official fanart, so also lots of credit to the artist: Yone Kazuki PS. it actually looks better than in the screenshot. [2013/10/18] Updated to match new (read: iOS 7) tumblr interface. [2013/11/30] Tweaked because tumblr decided to change a few codes. [2013/12/19] Edited out the blue in post-corners when hovering over them. [2014/01/30] Search bar went back to tumblr blue, so edited that. [2014/06/24] Help page edited. [2014/10/31] I hate how tumblr keeps messing w the UI
